data: `minecraft:flocking` allows entities to flock in groups in water or not.

data.Name: block_distance
data.Description: The distance in blocks that the entity will look at and move from.

data.Name: block_weight
data.Description: The weight of the push back away from blocks.

data.Name: breach_influence
data.Description: The amount of push back given to a flocker that breaches out of the water.

data.Name: cohesion_threshold
data.Description: The threshold in which to start applying cohesion.

data.Name: cohesion_weight
data.Description: The weight applied for the cohesion steering of the flock.

data.Name: goal_weight
data.Description: The weight on which to apply on the goal output.

data.Name: high_flock_limit
data.Description: Determines the high bound amount of entities that can be allowed in the flock.

data.Name: in_water
data.Description: Tells the Flocking Component if the entity exists in water.

data.Name: influence_radius
data.Description: The area around the entity that allows others to be added to the flock.

data.Name: innner_cohesion_threshold
data.Description: The distance in which the flocker will stop applying cohesion.

data.Name: loner_chance
data.Description: The percentage chance between 0-1 that a fish will spawn and not want to join flocks. Invalid values will be capped at the end points.

data.Name: low_flock_limit
data.Description: Determines the low bound amount of entities that can be allowed in the flock.

data.Name: match_variants
data.Description: Tells the flockers that they can only match similar entities that also match the variant, mark variants, and color data of the other potential flockers.

data.Name: max_height
data.Description: The max height allowable in the air or water.

data.Name: min_height
data.Description: The min height allowable in the air or water.

data.Name: separation_threshold
data.Description: The distance that is determined to be to close to another flocking and to start applying separation.

data.Name: separation_weight
data.Description: The weight applied to the separation of the flock.

data.Name: use_center_of_mass
data.Description: Tells the flockers that they will follow flocks based on the center of mass.
